downloadTitle: Steps to Run SSMA for Oracle - Including Data Migration v1.0
downloadDescription: Steps to Run SSMA for Oracle - Including Data Migration v1.0

downloadFile.name: Steps to Run SSMA for Oracle - Including Data Migration v1.0.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/7/7/a7735cd5-6635-4d5b-9dee-853bd4b6bf44/Steps to Run SSMA for Oracle - Including Data Migration v1.0.pdf

detailsSection:
This document is meant to be used as a Quick Start Guide to migrate schema & data from Oracle to 
Azure SQL DB using SSMA for Oracle v7.6.0.
detailsSection_file_name: Steps to Run SSMA for Oracle - Including Data Migration v1.0.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Whitepaper in the form of a pdf document.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
